name: Winter Sleep
description:
Snowflakes cling to the delicate dried petals of a sunflower in winter. Many protected seeds are preserved in the head of the flower, awaiting the favourable conditions of the next season to start anew and regrow, reaching again for the light of the sun. (Helianthus annuus)

The Sunflower is the National Flower of Ukraine, and this piece is my reflection of my complex existential feelings of the current devastating situation faced by the Ukrainian people. 

This piece is for fundraising purposes. 

Shares are split as follows; 
Malicioussheep - 1 
Beneficiary Donation Address - 10000
25% royalties. 

2017. Nikon D60, 55-200mm Lens.

Photographed in situ, without the use of artificial lighting or staging. Photoshop only used for resizing.

1024x685 300dpi jpeg
